Test Piece Contest
Any Liverpool Journal Piece
Handsworth, Woodhouse, Yorkshire Prizes - 1st £7, 2nd £5, 3rd £3, 4th £2. March contest - 1st Holmes Mills, 2nd Thurcroft, 3rd Woodhouse. Best cornet - Don Valley. 6 bands competed.
Nov. 6, 2013, 12:15 p.m. Feb. 24, 2021, 10:52 p.m.
1 Thurcroft Training Band H. T. Mosley William Tell [arr. Rimmer]
2 Don Valley Joe Travis Echoes of the Opera
3 Woodhouse Prize Band Thomas Cook Recollections of Auber
4 St Margaret's Church (Sheffield) Albert Bottom Echoes of the Opera
Unknown Result Holmes Mills Rotherham I. Patterson
Unknown Result Renishaw & Oxcroft Collieries J. H. Argyle
